text: Battlegroup I-2010 or BG I-2010 is an EU Battlegroup led by Poland (therefore also known as the Polish-led Battlegroup), in which Germany, Lithuania, Latvia and Slovakia also participate. It was on standby during the first half of 2010. == References == Category:Battlegroups of the European Union Category:Germany–Poland military relations Category:Germany–Latvia military relations Category:Germany–Lithuania military relations
title: Battlegroup I-2010
